bibl.title: The Two Manuscript Witnesses of the Gospel of Peter.
bibl.note: P. Cair. Inv. 10759 (= van Haelst 598) et P. Oxy. XLI, 2949 (= van Haelst 592). - Non vidimus. Cf. Internationale Zeitschriftenschau für Bibelwissenschaft 37 (1990-1991) No. 1570.
bibl.seg: TREAT Jay C., The Two Manuscript Witnesses of the Gospel of Peter.
